login.title: User Login
login.description: Securely log in to your account.

announcements.title: announcements
announcements.description: View and manage your announcement post.

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Log out of your account safely and securely.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Recover your account by resetting your forgotten password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Create a new password to regain access to your account.

acceptInvite.title: Accept Invite
acceptInvite.description: Accept your invitation to join and start collaborating.

feed.title: Your Feed
feed.description: View and interact with the latest updates and posts from your network.

users.title: Users Directory
users.description: Browse and connect with other users in the organization.

teams.title: Teams Directory
teams.description: Explore and join different teams within the organization.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: View detailed information and posts from this user.

teamProfile.title: Team Profile
teamProfile.description: View detailed information for this team.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information, posts, and settings.

apps.title: Applications
apps.description: Explore and manage applications connected to your account.

scheduledPosts.title: Scheduled Posts
scheduledPosts.description: View and manage your posts scheduled to be published.

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.description: Access and manage your saved bookmarks.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Customize your account settings and preferences.

postDetails.title: Post Details
postDetails.description: View detailed information about this post.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: View and manage your recent notifications.

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Explore and join different communication channels.

channelDetails.title: Channel Details
channelDetails.description: View detailed information and posts from this channel.

searchResults.title: Search Results
searchResults.description: Find content and users based on your search query.

pageNotFound.title: Page Not Found
pageNotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Check the URL or return to the homepage.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.
